page.title: 04Hard Work On A Fruit Farm.
page.content: Mr.Barnes has worked as a farm labourer at a fruit farm in Huntley for seven years.The tractors he mostly uses are a'John Deere'or a'Massey Ferguson.' There are a few other machines such as forklift trucks and a lorry. The special gear he has to wear for spraying is earmuffs,facemask,rubber gloves and a respirator. He wears a crash helmet when pruning big trees. For his holidays he gets four weeks. He has to have them before July and after September.He works forty hours in a normal week.In the summer he often works longer, from 5.30am to 9.30pm. He sometimes grades apples and pears.He likes working there.
